channel.title: CVE Feed for Nvidia Corporation -- Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Nvidia Corporation -- Android

item.title: CVE-2017-6247|2024-09-16T16:43:24.503Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- android
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the NVIDIA sound driver could enable a local malicious application to execute arbitrary code within the context of the kernel. This issue is rated as High due to the possibility of local arbitrary code execution in a privileged process in the kernel. Product: Android. Versions: N/A. Android ID: A-34386301. References: N-CVE-2017-6247.
